metadata.title: CVE-2024-2434 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions of GitLabCE/EE 16.9 prior to 16.9.6, 16.10 prior to 16.10.4, and 16.11 prior to16.11.1 where path traversal could lead to DoS and restricted file read.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
